overview: OXBOW BACK TO POWDER is OXBOW very first 100% backcountry snowboard film directed by Invert Production.  The OXBOW team made up of the riders JP Solberg (Norway), Kalle Ohlson (Sweden), Thomas GÃ©rin (France), Adan Baserba Berrocal (Spain), Thomas Delfino (France), Sophie Rodriguez (France) et David Livet (France); headed off to the world's mountains carving fresh tracks through the powder. In total 9 countries were explored by this group of snowboarders searching for the ideal spot.  src: http://mpora.com/videos/deWaB3V9v
title: Back to Powder
